item.title: Voice of America journalists sue Trump officials for dismantling the outlet
item.description: The lawsuit, filed in the Southern District of New York, asks a federal judge to order officials to restore the outlet.

item.title: Federal judge pushes back on acting Social Security head over threat to close agency
item.description: Leland Dudek argued that a ruling blocking Elon Musk’s cost-cutting team from access to sensitive taxpayer data could apply to all employees.
